response.summary: Data Scientist with a demonstrated history of working in the FinTech industry. Skilled in Computer Forensics, English, Pre-sales, Technical Writing, machine learning, data analysis and python. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor's Degree focused in Computer Engineering from Universidad Nacional de Colombia.
response.skills: Scala, Microsoft Power BI, Strategic Planning, Statistics, Team Leadership, Extract, Transform, Load (ETL), Python, data science, Technical Writing, Pre-sales, Computer Forensics, Proposal Writing, machine learning, data analysis, Linux, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Portuguese, English, E-Discovery Consulting

profile_positions.description:
▪ Developed new ETL processes using Azure tools like Data Factory.
▪ Designed and built datapipelines and data streams
▪ Integrated multiple data sources for analytics and BI processes using Azure.
▪ Integrated data from API's by using azure functions.
▪ Collaborate with other data engineers to maintain Enterprise Data Warehouse to support Reporting, Dimensional Modeling, and Data Development.
profile_positions.title: Data Engineer

profile_positions.description:
▪	Apply knowledge of statistics and machine learning to recognize patterns, identify opportunities, pose business questions, and make valuable discoveries leading to better business decision making.
▪	Developed a proof of concept related to create a flow for documents that allowed the customer to get readable PDF’s from images, by using AWS stack (Dynamo DB, lambda functions) and tools like textract, for a NASDAQ company.
▪	Performed a time series clustering analysis related to listings by counties, in order to find similar patterns between time series, for a real estate company.
▪	Performed a time series analysis to forecast the number of listings in the county of Santa Clara for a real estate company. 
▪	Developed a recommender system model to recommend the most suitable courses, in a MOOC platform.
▪	Used Google Cloud platform stack (dataproc, pubsub, storage, dataflow) to develop courses recommender system.
▪	Used NoSQL based graph database(Neo4j) to explore improvements in the recommender system.
▪	Developed a forecasting model to provide the Franchise sales director in a real estate company with the ability to quickly identify independent companies that could be good franchising opportunity.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description: Teacher assistant for the MSc course “Business Analytics”
profile_positions.title: Business Analytics Teacher Assistant

profile_positions.description:

▪ Use machine learning algorithms and natural language processing techniques to help solve language and text-based problems.
▪ Partner with IT to deploy predictive models.
▪ Created visualizations and dashboards by using SQL and CHARTIO (BI tool) to help stakeholders understand efficacy of models as well as visualizations that relate to their business objectives 
▪  Campaigns performance reporting across various marketing channels.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:

▪	Participated in the establishment of style guidelines and standards for texts and illustrations.
▪	Worked with Solution Architects and Bid Pursuit Managers to ensure appropriate content was captured into RFP / RFI response.
profile_positions.title: Pre-sales Technical Writer / BI Reporting analyst

profile_positions.description:

▪	Gave support to the web page of the ethics hotlines service.

profile_positions.title: Digital Forensic and data analytics Consultant

profile_positions.title: Data analytics and security systems Intern

company.name: Altimetrik
company.description: Altimetrik is a data and digital engineering services company focused on delivering business outcomes with an agile, product-oriented approach. Our digital business methodology provides a blueprint to develop, scale, and launch new products to market faster. Our team of 5,500+ practitioners with software, data, cloud engineering skills help create a culture of innovation and agility that optimizes team performance, modernizes technology, and builds new business models. As a strategic partner and catalyst, Altimetrik quickly delivers results without disruption to the business.
